name: Gaia, The Last Tree
description:
My First Game Jam Winter 2023 Submission By Sun.

Game Title: Gaia, The Last Tree

Theme: Growth

How To Play: Kill all the monsters and protect the tree. Every time you kill a monster their life force will be absorbed by the tree. Your goal is to level up the tree to max level (level 5) to win the game. 

Every time you level up you will be given power up that you can choose from. Try different combinations and see which fits best!

Fullscreen Recommended.
